title: test d'un template d'article soumis à revue basé sur du markdown & github

abstract.Purpose: This template provides a series of scripts to render a markdown document into an interactive website and a series of PDFs.
abstract.Motivation: It makes collaborating on text with GitHub easier, and means that we never need to think about the output.
abstract.Internals: GitHub actions and a series of python scritpts. The markdown is handled with `pandoc`.
